Name: The Dead City
About the game: The Dead City is an adventure game with RPG and survival elements.In it you will have to look for supplies, weapons, fight zombies and bandits. It's been a few months since the zombie apocalypse began.The world has fallen and it has become very dangerous because the earth is inhabited by zombies, bandits and small groups of survivors.To survive, you will have to leave the shelter and look for food, but this is a very dangerous business.After all, no one knows what a sortie can turn into.But sooner or later you will have to leave your hometown. Key Features : - Open world - Change of day and night - Craft - The need for food and sleep.
